project.name: C-C806D-WIRE-03-ST01-DT06-DF15-CF01-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C806D-WIRE-03-ST01-DT06-DF15-CF01-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved .pcap file Has a buffer declared on the heap. malloc(64*sizeOf(char)) If input is shorter than 64 it will overflowdue to using improper sizeof and strlen checking
